subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Promising plane crash debris ITC audio
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Cool experiment Mike. I look forward to your video. Plus it gave others ideas of how they would like to see the test done which means perhaps others will try similar experiments, done thier own way of course.

Misty


--- On Fri, 12/19/08, M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@...> wrote:

> From: M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Promising plane crash debris ITC audio
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Friday, December 19, 2008, 8:33 PM
> Thanks, Tom!
> Looking forward to it...
> Once I get them I'll send you a special secret web link
> so you can read 
> alot more about where the debris came from.  I'm
> sending the link to 
> all the researchers once they e-mail me the files so those
> who 
> participated can check their audio against the facts of the
> crash.
> 
> - Mike C.
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Tom Arnold
> <topgun0123@...> wrote:
> >
> > Mike,
> >    We will be conducting our session on saturday
> night.You will have 
> the files by sunday night.We plan to do it for about a half
> hour for 
> you because it is three of us.
> > Tom
